str2: By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
